en-GB.summary: Arms you with the knowledge you need to prove to anyone that you're smart.
examplePhrases: Alexa open yay all smart things
Alexa ask yay all smart things to arm me with knowledge
Alexa tell yay all smart things to tell me a fact about number 5
en-GB.name: Yay All Smart Things
en-GB.description: Arms you with the knowledge you need to prove to anyone that you're smart.
